moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

moves.name: Follow Me
moves.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

moves.name: Me First
moves.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use the target's intended move with greater power.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.
